sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_par_no_lov(#assdNo#, #userId#, #findText#))
WHERE UPPER(par_line_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(par_iss_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (par_yy) LIKE (#findText#) OR (par_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR (quote_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#)
ORDER BY dsp_par_no
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_par_no_lov(#assdNo#, #userId#, #findText#)))
WHERE UPPER(par_line_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(par_iss_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (par_yy) LIKE (#findText#) OR (par_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR (quote_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_prem_dep_tg(#tranId#,#gfunFundCd#,#gibrBranchCd#, #itemNo#,#tranTypeName#,#oldTranId#,#issName#, #billNo#,#collectionAmt#,#instNo#,#depFlag#))
ORDER BY item_no
ORDER BY tran_type_name
ORDER BY dsp_old_tran_no
ORDER BY iss_name
ORDER BY b140_prem_seq_no
ORDER BY collection_amt
ORDER BY inst_no
ORDER BY dsp_dep_flag
ASC
DESC
WHERE 1=1
item_no LIKE #itemNo#
tran_type_name LIKE upper(#tranTypeName#)
dsp_old_tran_no LIKE #dspOldTranNo#
iss_name LIKE upper(#issName#)
b140_prem_seq_no LIKE #b140PremSeqNo#
collection_amt LIKE upper(#collectionAmt#)
inst_no LIKE #instNo#
dsp_dep_flag LIKE upper(#dspDepFlag#)
)a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_prem_dep_tg(#tranId#,#gfunFundCd#,#gibrBranchCd#, #itemNo#,#tranTypeName#,#oldTranId#,#issName#, #billNo#,#collectionAmt#,#instNo#,#depFlag#))) ) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_iss_cd_lov(#moduleId#, #userId#, #issCd#, #tranType#))
WHERE UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
ORDER BY b140_iss_cd
ORDER BY b140_prem_seq_no
ORDER BY inst_no
ORDER BY dsp_a150_line_cd
ORDER BY dsp_total_amount_due
ORDER BY dsp_total_payments
ORDER BY dsp_temp_payments
ORDER BY dsp_balance_amt_due
ORDER BY dsp_a020_assd_no
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_iss_cd_lov(#moduleId#, #userId#, #issCd#, #tranType#)))
WHERE UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_ri_iss_cd_lov)
WHERE (UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) )
ORDER BY ri_cd
ORDER BY b140_prem_seq_no
ORDER BY inst_no
ORDER BY dsp_a150_line_cd
ORDER BY dsp_total_amount_due
ORDER BY dsp_total_payments
ORDER BY dsp_temp_payments
ORDER BY dsp_balance_amt_due
ORDER BY dsp_a020_assd_no
ORDER BY assured_name
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_ri_iss_cd_lov))
WHERE (UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(b140_prem_seq_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) )
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_assd_name_lov(#assdNo#,#assuredName#,UPPER(#keyword#)))
WHERE UPPER(assured_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(assd_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
ORDER BY assured_name
ORDER BY assd_no
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_assd_name_lov(#assdNo#,#assuredName#,UPPER(#keyword#))))
WHERE UPPER(assured_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(assd_no) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_intm_name_lov(#intmNo#,#intmName#,UPPER(#keyword#)))
ORDER BY intm_name
ORDER BY intm_no
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_intm_name_lov(#intmNo#,#intmName#,UPPER(#keyword#)))) ) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_giac_pol_no_lov(#assdNo#, #userId#, #findText#))
WHERE UPPER(line_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(iss_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (issue_yy) LIKE (#findText#) OR (pol_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR (renew_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR UPPER(assd_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (endt_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#)
ORDER BY policy_no
ORDER BY assd_name
ORDER BY endt_seq_no
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(giac_prem_deposit_pkg.get_giac_pol_no_lov(#assdNo#, #userId#, #findText#)))
WHERE UPPER(line_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(iss_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (issue_yy) LIKE (#findText#) OR (pol_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR (renew_no) LIKE (#findText#) OR UPPER(assd_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR (endt_seq_no) LIKE (#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#
